post_text:
Greetings Sag Harbor Community,

Earlier today Section XI announced that all sports will be postponed until January 4, 2021, due to the Pandemic. This decision was made in conjunction with the Athletic Council and the Suffolk County Executive Board. Student athletes, please remember that this is not a cancellation this is a postponement. The Athletic Office will be working over the next several months toward the goal of providing our student-athletes with interscholastic athletics at the start of the new year. If you have any questions please email me directly at ebramoff@sagharborschools.org. Let's go Whalers 2021!!

Eric Bramoff
Director of Athletics

STEM SUMMER PROGRAM FOR JUNIORS AT BROOKHAVEN NATIONAL LAB: The High School Research Program seeks to connect students who are interested in science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM) fields with Brookhaven National Laboratory researchers. The High School Research Program is a competitive summer program for current 11th grade students. It is held at the Brookhaven National Laboratory between July 8 and August 16, 2019. Any students interested in a rewarding summer experience working in a laboratory should apply!
More information and the application is all online at: https://www.bnl.gov/education/program.asp?q=219
